text: This outlet Japan home is selling defected products, I bought a clock here, is defected and not working, went back to exchange for another, but also defected. Went back again to the same outlet, the staff told that the defected clock is not allowed to be exchanged, selling products that are defected, Scammer and daylight robbery...
Normal for House hold items I only go for Japan homes for the durability and reasonable price

I had an incredibly frustrating experience at Japan Home Yew Tee Point. The cashier not only demonstrated a complete lack of attention but also managed to overcharge me by mistakenly scanning an extra padlock. This negligence tarnished my shopping experience, leaving me thoroughly dissatisfied. Double-check your receipts if you decide to shop here.

Terrible chocolate product funny taste my husband he bought and eat after come home few minutes his not feeling well vomiting and we go to clinic the chocolate worth of .50 cent and the doctor fee charge is $50.
Nothing much but some items are cool looking.
